name: Prospector Solitaire (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player's task is to get rid of the cards before the deck in the right corner is exhausted. In the center is the current card, on which the player must put either the highest card or the lowest. If the player has nothing to replace the central card: he takes a card from the deck on the right, which lies on the central one.
  • The game is controlled by the gaming mouse.
  • If a player has scored a record number of points, then his score is saved.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Prospector-Solitaire

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
